description.zh-cn: 明朝初年政治家、文学家、史学家，被朱元璋誉为“开国文臣之首”。
description.en: A politician, writer, and historian of the early Ming Dynasty, hailed by Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang as the 'head of the founding civil officials'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝学者、文学家、思想家，宋濂的学生。
description.en: A Ming dynasty scholar, writer, and thinker, who was a student of Song Lian.

description.zh-cn: 元末古文大家，宋濂的老师之一。
description.en: A master of classical prose in the late Yuan dynasty, and one of Song Lian's teachers.

description.zh-cn: 元末学者，宋濂的老师之一。
description.en: A scholar of the late Yuan dynasty and one of Song Lian's teachers.

description.zh-cn: 元末学者，宋濂的老师之一。
description.en: A scholar of the late Yuan dynasty and one of Song Lian's teachers.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂的长孙，因牵连胡惟庸案被杀。
description.en: Song Lian's eldest grandson, who was executed for his involvement in the Hu Weiyong case.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期发生的一场重大政治案件，丞相胡惟庸被指控谋反，株连甚广。
description.en: A major political case in the early Ming Dynasty where Chancellor Hu Weiyong was accused of treason, leading to extensive purges.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第十一子，封蜀王。因仰慕宋濂，将其转葬于华阳。
description.en: The eleventh son of Emperor Taizu of Ming, Zhu Yuanzhang, enfeoffed as the Prince of Shu. He admired Song Lian and had his tomb relocated to Huayang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，于弘治九年为宋濂平反。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Ming dynasty, who rehabilitated Song Lian in the ninth year of the Hongzhi era.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十位皇帝，于正德年间为宋濂追谥“文宪”。
description.en: The tenth emperor of the Ming dynasty, who granted Song Lian the posthumous title 'Wenxian' during the Zhengde era.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣，政治家、文学家，与宋濂、高启并称“明初诗文三大家”。
description.en: A founding father of the Ming dynasty, a politician and writer, known as one of the 'Three Masters of Poetry and Prose of the Early Ming' along with Song Lian and Gao Qi.

description.zh-cn: 清代画家，曾为宋濂绘制肖像。
description.en: A Qing dynasty painter who created a portrait of Song Lian.

description.zh-cn: 《二十四史》之一，由宋濂、王祎主修，记载元朝历史的纪传体史书。
description.en: One of the Twenty-Four Histories, primarily compiled by Song Lian and Wang Yi, it is an annalistic-biographical history of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由朱元璋建立的中国历史上的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 由蒙古族建立的中国历史上的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by the Mongols.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂的籍贯所在地。
description.en: Song Lian's ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂因胡惟庸案被流放的地点。
description.en: The location where Song Lian was exiled due to the Hu Weiyong case.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂曾受业于吴莱。
description.en: Song Lian once studied under Wu Lai.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂曾游学于柳贯门下。
description.en: Song Lian once studied under Liu Guan.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂曾游学于黄溍门下。
description.en: Song Lian once studied under Huang Jin.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺是宋濂的学生。
description.en: Fang Xiaoru was a student of Song Lian.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂在明朝担任官职，累官至翰林学士承旨、知制诰，后于1377年以年老辞官还乡。
description.en: Song Lian held official posts in the Ming Dynasty, eventually rising to Hanlin Academy Scholar-Recitor and Drafter, before retiring in 1377 due to old age.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂奉朱元璋之命，担任《元史》的主修官。
description.en: Under the order of Zhu Yuanzhang, Song Lian served as the chief editor of the 'History of Yuan'.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋于1368年称帝，建立明朝。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang proclaimed himself emperor in 1368, establishing the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 因长孙宋慎牵连胡惟庸案，宋濂全家被流放茂州，宋濂本人最终死于流放途中。
description.en: Due to his grandson Song Shen's involvement in the Hu Weiyong case, Song Lian's entire family was exiled to Maozhou, and Song Lian himself died during the exile.

description.zh-cn: 宋慎因被认定为胡惟庸党羽而遭处置。
description.en: Song Shen was punished for being identified as a partisan of Hu Weiyong.

description.zh-cn: 在胡惟庸案中，朱元璋本欲处死宋濂，后经皇后、太子求情，改判全家流放茂州。
description.en: In the Hu Weiyong case, Zhu Yuanzhang initially intended to execute Song Lian, but after pleas from the Empress and Crown Prince, the sentence was commuted to the exile of his entire family to Maozhou.

description.zh-cn: 宋慎是宋濂的长孙。
description.en: Song Shen was Song Lian's eldest grandson.

description.zh-cn: 宋濂出生于浙江浦江县。
description.en: Song Lian was born in Pujiang County, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 刘基称赞宋濂为“当今文章第一”。
description.en: Liu Ji praised Song Lian as 'the foremost in literature of our time'.

description.zh-cn: 蜀王朱椿因仰慕宋濂，在其死后将其转葬至华阳城东。
description.en: Out of admiration for Song Lian, Prince Zhu Chun of Shu had his tomb relocated to the east of Huayang city after his death.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗下令为宋濂平反，追复其官职。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor ordered the posthumous rehabilitation of Song Lian, restoring his official titles.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗在正德年间为宋濂追谥“文宪”。
description.en: The Zhengde Emperor granted Song Lian the posthumous title 'Wenxian' during the Zhengde era.

description.zh-cn: 顾见龙为宋濂绘制了肖像。
description.en: Gu Jianlong painted a portrait of Song Lian.
